title: Keyboard navigation
description:
Add keyboard controls for TUI.

Keybindings:
- q/ctrl-c: quit
- p: pause/resume
- j/k or up/down: scroll output
- g/G: top/bottom of output
- tab: switch panel focus
- ?: show help

internal/tui/keys.go:
- Key handler
- Help overlay

Verify: All keybindings work as documented
